mapper.select: select ord.shop_id ord_shop_id,pt.id id,um.shop_id um_shop_id,um.username um_username,pt.member_nick_name memberNickName, pt.product_name productName,pt.star star,pt.member_ip memberIp,pt.create_time createTime, pt.show_status showStatus,pt.product_attribute productAttribute,pt.collect_couont collectCouont, pt.read_count readCount,pt.pics pics,pt.member_icon memberIcon,pt.replay_count replayCount, pt.content content from ums_member um inner join oms_order ord on um.id =ord.member_id inner join pms_comment pt on ord.shop_id=pt.shop_id inner join pms_product ppt on ppt.shop_id=ord.shop_id where ord.`status`=3 and pt.show_status=1 and ord.member_id=#{memberId}
select count(*) from ums_member um inner join oms_order ord on um.id =ord.member_id join pms_comment pt on ord.shop_id=pt.shop_id where ord.`status`=3 and ord.member_id=#{memberId}
select token,id from ums_member where token=#{token}

SELECT ooi.order_id orderId, ooi.product_id productId, ooi.product_name productName, ppa.NAME FROM oms_order ood JOIN oms_order_item ooi ON ooi.order_id = ood.id JOIN pms_product_attribute ppa ON ooi.product_id = ppa.id WHERE ooi.order_id =#{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE pms_comment SET show_status = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
